snippet: To prepare for the postseason, the Rangers will watch more video of their own play than that of their first-round opponent, the Ottawa Senators.
abstract: New York Rangers are preparing for their first-round NHL playoff series against the Ottawa Senators.

byline.contributor: Jeff Z. Klein contributed reporting from Greenburgh, N.Y.

lead_paragraph: To prepare for the postseason, the Rangers will watch more video of their own play than that of their first-round opponent, the Ottawa Senators.

headline.seo: Rangers Prepare for Playoffs by Looking at Themselves
headline.main: Rangers Prepare by Looking at Themselves
headline.print_headline: Rangers Prepare by Looking at Themselves
